name: Strata
tagline: One MCP server for AI agents to handle thousands of tools
description: Strata is one MCP server that guides your AI agents through thousands of tools in multiple apps progressively. It eliminates context overload and ensures accurate tool selection, enabling agents to handle complex, multi-app workflows with ease.

name: Snapdeck
tagline: Lovable for Slides. No more wrestling with PowerPoint.
description: Build a winning deck in a snap. Create professional presentations effortlessly with AI-powered slide generation, intuitive editing, and beautiful, customizable designs.

name: alphaAI Capital
tagline: AI Trading App that Dynamically Adapts to the Markets
description: alphaAI Capital dynamically manages your portfolio using AI, shifting between aggressive and defensive modes as market conditions change. Access fully-automated leveraged ETF, crypto ETF, and tax-aware strategies tailored to your risk profile.

name: Notion 3.0
tagline: You assign the tasks. Your Agents do the work.
description: Today we launched Notion 3.0 with Agents. Anything you can do in Notion, your Agent can do too. The busywork that fills your day can now be done in minutes.

name: Pie
tagline: The first AI QA team. Ship with confidence.
description: Stop choosing between shipping fast and shipping right. Our AI QA team catches what breaks before your users do. Setup in minutes, ship with confidence forever.

name: Postage.to
tagline: Send physical letters worldwide from your browser
description: Sending international letters is expensive, complicated, and time-consuming. Postage.to makes it as simple as sending an email - upload your document or write a letter, enter the recipient's address, and we handle the printing and delivery to 190+ countries.

name: SwipeSwoop
tagline: Tinder for camera roll
description: SwipeSwoop is the app that will (finally) help you clean up your camera roll. And the best part? Youâ€™ll enjoy reminiscing while you do it.

name: Voiser
tagline: Dub & Translate Videos in 140+ Languages with Voiser AI
description: AI-powered dubbing & video translation in 140+ languages. Instantly turn any video into multilingual content and connect with a global audience effortlessly

name: vol
tagline: searches podcast episodes that help you be the best you
description: vol has been rebuilt. you can now: - tell vol what you want - let it search and select the best podcast episodes for you - listen in your own podcast player

name: Humanly AI Interviewer & Talent Partners
tagline: Interview, evaluate, and hire faster with AI avatars
description: Hire better, faster, and more efficiently with Humanly. Our AI Interviewersâ€”supported by human talent partnersâ€”help recruiters process 40% more candidates, cut time-to-fill by 11 days, and reduce cost-per-hire by 85% while improving fairness and consistency.

name: Wins 3
tagline: Switch to the exact windowâ€”right from Cmd-Tab.
description: Wins 3 keeps you in flow on macOS. New Cmd-Tab Plus adds window selection to the system switcherâ€”jump straight to the exact window you need. Now styled for macOS 26â€™s Liquid Glass, so it looks and feels native.

name: HookBox
tagline: An Instant Webhook & Email Debugging tool for developers.
description: HookBox gives developers instant webhook endpoints and temporary email inboxesâ€”no signup required. Capture, inspect, replay, and debug faster with AI-powered insights.

name: Briefly
tagline: Know what your remote team actually did today
description: Briefly makes managing remote teams simple. Employees submit a 60-second daily report, and admins get a clean dashboard to track progress, spot blockers, and keep everyone aligned â€” without endless meetings.

name: Lead Magnet Examples
tagline: 200,000+ free tool keywords
description: A collection of 200,000+ lead magnet keywords. Build free tools your audience is searching for right now. Updated for 2025.

name: RadarKit AI
tagline: AI Rank Tracker for SEO, Brand Mentions & Growth
description: Get your brand mentioned by LLMs Analyze how AI answers for the keywords your brand wants to rank. Find Backlinks Opportunity Spy on Competitors. We prompt LLM interfaces directly, we don't use APIs.

name: Altmole
tagline: Turn product photos into search traffic. Automatically.
description: AltMole turns product photos into search traffic. Generate SEO ready alt text, titles, descriptions, and keywords in seconds. Bulk, 50+ languages, WCAG friendly, and site audit for missing alt. Faster content and higher visibility. Try it now.

name: Post0
tagline: Automate your social flow
description: Post0 helps you automate your LinkedIn posts with smart scheduling, AI-powered content, and analytics. Create schedules, manage galleries, and grow your presence effortlessly.

name: Proqube
tagline: AI-Powered Sourcing: From discovery to outreach in minutes
description: Proqube is an AI-powered sourcing platform that finds and vets the best-fit suppliers in seconds. Send RFIs, schedule humanized AI call outreach, and manage supplier outreach all in one place - making sourcing fast, simple, and cost-efficient.

name: Loopado AI
tagline: Chat with your reviews, get insights, automate actions
description: Loopado is a GenAI for mobile app product managers, UX designers, and customer support teams. It pulls review data from the App Store and Google Play. Just ask a question to get quick insights.

name: IngredientSubstitutes.com
tagline: Never stuck in the kitchen again
description: Discover the best substitutes for any ingredient in cooking and baking. Comprehensive guides with ratios, cooking tips, and alternatives for every recipe.
